body: One of your best dancers is tainted by evil magic—he's possessed, was replaced by a shapechanging evil outsider, or something similar—and is preying upon your customers. Spend 5 Magic or use appropriate spells to exorcise the evil presence. If not, you lose 1 point of Influence or Labor (your choice) each day, but the building gains a +10 bonus on checks to generate gp or Magic.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Downtime Events/Dance Hall Events/Fiendish Skill
name: Fiendish Skill
